work.name: Leiden University

work.name: Leiden University
work.position: Teaching Assistant for the course 'Science and the Public' (M.Sc.)
work.summary: Teaching Assistant for the Master level course 'Science and the Public' at the Astronomy department of Leiden University. for two academic years (spring semester 2023 and 2024).

work.name: Leiden University
work.position: Teaching Assistant for the course 'Astronomy Lab and Observing Project' (B.Sc.)
work.summary: Teaching Assistant for the Bachelor level course 'Astronomy Lab and Observing Project' at the Astronomy department of Leiden University. As a TA, I was responsible for the supervision of the students during the observations at the Isaac Newton Telescope in La Palma, Spain.

work.name: Self-employed
work.position: Private Tutor in Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry
work.summary: Private tutor in Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry for high school and undergraduate students. I have been teaching students for the high school exams in Greece and university students from many different departments for their exams.

work.name: Greek Team for the International Olympiad on Astronomy and Astrophysics
work.position: Instructor for the preparation of the Greek Team for the International Olympiad on Astronomy and Astrophysics
work.summary: I have been teaching the students the theoretical and practical aspects of Astronomy and Astrophysics, as well as the necessary skills for the competition. The preparation includes lectures, exercises, and exams and takes place during the summer months.

work.name: Aristotle University of Thessaloniki
work.position: Grading Assistant for the course 'Astronomy and Astrophysics' (B.Sc.)
work.summary: Grading Assistant for the Bachelor level course 'Astronomy and Astrophysics' at the Physics department of Aristotle University of Thessaloniki. I was responsible for the grading of the students' homework and exercises.

volunteer.position: Public Outreach Guide at the Astronomical Observatory of the University
volunteer.summary: As a public outreach guide, I was responsible for the organization and execution of the public events at the Astronomical Observatory of the University. The events include public observations, lectures, workshops and school visits.
